title: New Pulsfire Ezreal?
body: Well I was considering buying PF Ezreal, but I might wait till he comes out, my decisions hinges upon whether or not when the VU hits live will it be on sale?

replies.body:
Pulsefire Ezreal currently has a texture update amongst other things (Expanded voiceover, improved VFX, added emotes) on the PBE (Testing server) right now.
Firstly, I'd check out the link I've posted below to see if the update is to your liking (Assuming you haven't seen it already).
Secondly, I'd wait for another week or so, as the update is likely to be adjusted a bit here and there over the course of next week. 
The site which I provided a link to will be updated after each daily update, Monday-Friday, so just keep an eye on Surrenderat20 for its PBE Updates.
It is not yet known if there will be a PFE sale, so I'd wait till the patch goes live in a week and a half before buying the skin.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/p/current-pbe-balance-changes.html#ez

P.S To correct your use of Riot terminology, 'VU' or 'Visual Update' is used when the champion receives an update to its model, textures, animations and usually VO. In this case, his model and animations have not been adjusted, so it's more of a 'TU' or 'Texture Update'. You'll have to wait a few years for Ezreal and all his skins to be updated with a VU I'm afraid.

As far as I can tell from official Riot sources, we don't have a visual update currently planned for Pulsefire Ezreal....

With that being said, however!! I was able to find a few sources by googling his possible visual update, and they may have really outdone themselves even more than the first time (old joke is old)! Since I don't have any official info about whether or not this PFE VU is true or not, I can't really say whether you should get him now or wait. The one thing I can say is this: if you're concerned about how he will look in the future, I would suggest waiting to see how it turns out first!
